featureCarousel.transformDescription: See how our solutions address common e-commerce challenges and revolutionize your business

solution1.description: Customers often called manually to ask about the status of their orders, leading to frustration and a surge in inquiries. Additionally, many parcels were returned due to delivery companies failing to contact clients about their orders, resulting in wasted time and resources. Our automated SMS notifications keep customers informed every step of the way, significantly reducing support requests, improving delivery success rates, and enhancing overall satisfaction.

solution2.description: Don't let your customers forget your brand. With SMS retargeting, you can reignite their interest with timely and personalized messages. Share irresistible promo codes, announce stunning new collections, and remind them why they fell in love with your products in the first place. Build excitement, nurture loyalty, and watch your audience return with renewed enthusiasm. Every message is a chance to reconnect and inspire.

solution3.problem: Manual order entry from social media
solution3.description: Our AI solution streamlines order processing by automatically extracting details from social media chats, using advanced natural language processing to detect order information from emojis, keywords, and conversation context. It seamlessly integrates with websites, retrieving data directly from online checkout forms and order databases. This ensures accurate, real-time updates in the delivery system, eliminating manual entry errors, saving time, and optimizing efficiency for delivery companies.

solution4.problem: Creating engaging product visuals takes time and budget.
solution4.solution: Automate your visuals with AI-powered image and video generation.
solution4.description: With our Creative AI tools, you can instantly generate professional visuals tailored for ads, product listings, and social media — saving hours of manual design work. Whether you're a small business owner or a marketing expert, our platform empowers you to bring your ideas to life with just a few clicks. No need for expensive software or design experience — just choose your style, upload your content, and let our AI do the rest. Stay ahead of the competition with fast, high-quality visuals that truly capture your brand’s identity.

stats.after: Now ready in under 10 minutes with AI

videoSection.title: Smart SMS Automation
videoSection.description: Transform the way you engage with your customers. Watch our video to see how our SMS features streamline order updates, enhance customer satisfaction, and drive conversions. With real-time notifications and retargeting campaigns, you can revolutionize your communication strategy and keep customers informed, connected, and loyal.

featureShowcase.mainDescription: Our comprehensive platform provides everything you need to analyze, optimize, and scale your business.

feature1.title: Auto Tracking Link
feature1.description: Provide customers with an automated tracking link for their orders, enabling real-time updates and seamless monitoring of delivery status, right from their phones.

feature2.title: Personalized SMS Notifications
feature2.description: Send tailored SMS alerts to customers with their order details, shipping updates, and delivery schedules, ensuring a personalized experience at every step.

feature3.title: SMS Retargeting Campaigns
feature3.description: Boost your conversion rates by re-engaging customers who have abandoned their carts through timely, targeted SMS campaigns designed to bring them back.

feature4.title: Custom Sender ID
feature4.description: Use your brand's name or a customized sender ID for SMS communications, ensuring that customers instantly recognize your messages and feel connected to your brand.

feature5.title: Generate AI-Powered Images & Reels
feature5.description: Create stunning product visuals and engaging video reels in seconds — optimized for e-commerce performance.

feature6.title: AI Order Retriever from Messenger
feature6.description: Automatically extract and process orders from your Messenger conversations using AI — no more manual work needed.

ai.transformSocialMedia: Transform your social media conversations into seamless order processing with our advanced AI technology. No more manual order entry - let our AI handle it for you.
ai.Automatically detect and process orders: Automatically detect and process orders from social media conversations
ai.Understand customer intent and extract o: Understand customer intent and extract order details from natural conversations
ai.Instantly create orders when confirmatio: Instantly create orders when confirmation emoji is detected

testimonials.customer_experience: See what our customers say about their experience with Colitrack
testimonials.ready_to_transform: Ready to Transform Your E-commerce Business?
testimonials.join_thousands: Join thousands of businesses that trust Colitrack for their SMS automation and order tracking needs.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: Colitrack has transformed how we handle order communications. Our customer satisfaction rates have increased by 45% since implementing their SMS automation.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: The automated tracking updates have significantly reduced our customer service workload. It is like having an extra team member handling all our shipping communications.

testimonials.name: Emma Rodriguez
testimonials.content: As a small business owner, Colitrack has been a game-changer. The personalized tracking links and automated SMS have given us an enterprise-level customer experience.

creativeAii.description: Transform your creative workflow with advanced AI technology. Generate stunning visuals, create engaging content, and bring your ideas to life with our intelligent creative platform.
creativeAii.intelligentContentDescription: Advanced AI algorithms create high-quality images and reels tailored to your specific needs and brand requirements.
creativeAii.lightningFastDescription: Generate professional-quality content in seconds, not hours. Our optimized AI models deliver results at unprecedented speed.
creativeAii.precisionDescription: Fine-tune every aspect of your content with advanced controls and parameters for pixel-perfect results.
